thread.section_title: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport North - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Brisbane, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Visit Details
thread.title_full: Visit Details - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: 505noeld
title: Visit Details
text: Great customer service! My wife and I stayed at this place for six days and all the staffs provided us a first class service from day one and through out our stay. Highly recommend to everyone that are planning to visit San Francisco to choose this hotel to stay. Outstanding location, very close to all attractions and less than 4 miles away from the airport. Room is very clean and peaceful...we definitely love this place. To all the staff, thanks again for a job well done!!!
